<!-- The only difference between this Rmd and the standalone Rmd is  -->
<!-- pathCoRoutput <- paste0("cor_coxph/", pathCoRoutput) -->


\counterwithin{table}{section}
\counterwithin{figure}{section}


<!-- these latex variables are used in report_sub -->
\newif\ifCOVE
\newif\ifENSEMBLE
`r paste0("\\", study_name_code, "true")` 


<!-- COVE -->

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
here::i_am("cor_coxph/report.Rmd")
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())

if (study_name_code=="COVE") {
  for (i in 1:2) {
    tpeak <- ifelse(i==1, 29, 57)
    COR <- paste0("D", tpeak)
    special.note = ""
    pathCoRoutput <- paste0("output/", attr(config,"config"), "/", COR)
    pathCoRoutput <- paste0("cor_coxph/", pathCoRoutput)
    res = knitr::knit_child(c(here::here('cor_coxph', 'report_sub.Rmd')), quiet = TRUE)
    cat(res, sep = '\n')
    cat("\\clearpage", sep = '\n')
  }
}
```




<!-- ENSEMBLE -->

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
if (study_name_code=="ENSEMBLE") {
  for (i in 1:2) {
    tpeak <- 29
    COR <- ifelse(i==1, "D29", "D29start1")
    special.note = paste0("$\\ddagger$ Count cases starting ", ifelse(i==1,7,1), " days post Day 29.")
    pathCoRoutput <- paste0("output/", attr(config,"config"), "/", COR)
    pathCoRoutput <- paste0("cor_coxph/", pathCoRoutput)
    res = knitr::knit_child(c(here::here('cor_coxph', 'report_sub.Rmd')), quiet = TRUE)
    cat(res, sep = '\n')
    cat("\\clearpage", sep = '\n')
  }
}
```
